sentences.sContent: the United Nations Secretariat in New York
sentences.sCn: 设在纽约的联合国秘书处

words.tran: 书记、秘书等的职务或任期

trans.tranCn: 秘书处；书记处；秘书（书记，部长等）之职
trans.tranOther: a government office or the office of a large international organization, especially one that has a  secretary general  in charge of it
